description: Demonstrates fan-out pattern: each sounding processes a different item from an array, then aggregates results

inputs_schema.topics: Array of topics to research in parallel

phases.name: research_topics
phases.instructions:
You are researching the topic: **{{ input.topics[sounding_index] }}**

Provide a brief but informative summary (2-3 paragraphs) covering:
1. What it is and why it matters
2. Key benefits or applications
3. Current trends or future outlook

Be concise but insightful.

soundings.aggregator_instructions:
You have received research summaries on multiple topics. Create a unified research report that:
1. Organizes the topics thematically
2. Identifies connections between topics
3. Provides an executive summary at the top
4. Preserves the key insights from each topic

Format as a well-structured markdown document.
